title: Richer static dataset + improved initial hint reveal UX

requirements.summary: Expand the static in-app dataset so all core screens (Books, Topics, Question Detail, Saved Questions) look populated and counts are accurate.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/data.ts` contains enough sample content to make all core screens feel populated (multiple books, multiple sections per book, and multiple topics per section).

Sample topics include realistic values for `meta`, `description`, and at least some topics include `content`, `hints`, and `solution` so that the Question Detail view shows each section with meaningful content.
Book summary fields (`sections`, `topics`) match the actual number of sections/topics in the dataset so counts shown on the Books page are accurate.
No user-facing placeholder text is non-English.

file_operations.description: Expand `books` with additional books/sections/topics and richer per-topic fields (`meta`, `description`, plus some `content`, `hints`, `solution`). Ensure `Book.sections` equals `data.length` and `Book.topics` equals total count of topics with IDs across all sections so Books page counts stay accurate. Ensure all visible strings are English.

requirements.summary: When the user expands the Hints section, immediately reveal the first hint along with the hint controls.
acceptanceCriteria: When expanding the Hints collapsible (in `frontend/src/components/QuestionSections.tsx`), the first hint is visible immediately without requiring an extra click.
The controls (Show Next Hint / Show All / Hide All) still function correctly after the change (can reveal more hints, reveal all, and hide all).
The initial expanded hints state no longer matches the behavior shown in the uploaded screenshot (buttons only, no hint content).
No regressions: topics with `hints.length === 0` do not render the Hints section (current behavior remains).

file_operations.description: Update HintsPanel to support an initial visible hint count (e.g., via a prop like `initialVisibleCount` or equivalent) so the first hint can be shown immediately while preserving Show Next/Show All/Hide All behavior. Verify the shadcn-ui component usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust the Hints collapsible wiring to pass an initial visible hint count when the Hints section is opened (and/or reset the panel on first open) so the first hint renders immediately alongside the controls. Keep the existing guard that does not render the Hints section when `hints.length === 0`. Verify the shadcn-ui component usage instructions before implementing.
